import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { addToCartThunk, removeFromCartThunk } from "../../store/modules/cart/thunks" import "./styles.css" export const ShowCart = ({ product, isRemovable = false }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const { id, name, price, image } = product return (

{name}

R$800

R${price}

{isRemovable ? : }
) }
